history.proof: intros p q Hplus. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros p q Hplus. induction Hplus. - apply eqp_refl. - apply eqp_sym in IHplusP. apply eqp_trans with (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 l1). + apply plusP_inv3a in mainu1 as H1. apply eqp_inv3r in H1. apply eqp_trans with (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 l1); auto. + apply eqp_trans with (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2). * apply plusP_inv3a in mainu1. apply plusP_com in mainu1. apply eqp_sym in mainu1. apply eqp_trans with mainu1; auto. * apply IHplusP.
